title: A few things I think are overdue
body:
This is nothing too serious, but there are a few things I feel we should have by now.
First of all, a few splash arts such as Irelia's classic art, Kennen's classic art, Warwick's classic art and perhaps Xin'z classic art. I'm pretty sure Irelia's one is overdue since we had a preview of it sometime ago in LCS, and Warwick's probably won't come anytime soon since he might get reworked. Xin'z is just begging for a re-splash, I mean, out of the 3 Demacian bros two of them (J4 & Garen) both had new artworks.

In terms of remodeling, perhaps Evelynn, Ryze (it says everywhere that his model is finished...), definitely Nunu and perhaps classic Janna.

I know some of these models may have gotten texture upgrades, but the models are just...eh...

I didn't mention real obvious ones like Taric but thats cuz he's like Warwick and is probably getting an overhaul
